actions.text: Camera starts at the top at Y=0, then goes down to the player.
Player should be on top of everything else.
Set random animation frame for aircons.
Move doors to the bottom of the layer.

children.text: Apply camera movement and rain animation every tick.
Only move if the player is not crouching.
Only move if the player is not crouching.
Player is not creating a block.
Set player animation while on the floor.
Set player animation while on the air.
Spawn particles when the player lands.
Try to create a new block.

actions.text: Create tester for valid block position.
Destroy gadget hit after some time.

children.text: Gadget is destroyed if it hits certain objects.

actions.text: Destroy gadget hit after some time.
Wait a little and destroy the block.

children.text: If the player touches a switch, it is activated.

actions.text: Set previous direction as the current direction.
Wait a little, then invert the direction.

children.text: Apply enemy movement logic if direction is not 0.
Check for hard walls in front of the enemy. If there aren't any, move.
Check for floor. If it's present, move.
Otherwise, since there is no floor present, stop and change direction.
Else, if there is a wall, stop and change direction.
Some enemies can fall and break.

actions.text: Wait a little, then destroy the enemy.

children.text: Enemies have a built-in driller that destroys player blocks.

actions.text: Wait a little and destroy the block.

children.text: If an enemy or spotlight collides if the player, it's game over.

actions.text: Fade out and restart the game.

children.text: If the player reaches the win zone, restart the game.

actions.text: Fade out and restart the game.
